activities: Otter Products, LLC receives customer and human resources personal information from European Union and Switzerland. The personal data Otter Products, LLC collects from customers is used to provide the services requested by the customer including electronic newsletters, to participate in our message boards or forums, for participation in polls, testimonials, and surveys, account registration, for warranty validation, or to make purchases from the website. Otter Products, LLC receives employee personal data for global recruitment functions, human resources management and administration, and to provide benefits.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer data collected online, off-line, manually processed data, and human resource data
